title: Curse of Agony
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

| [![Agony.png](/images/b/be/Agony.png)](/File:Agony.png) Curse of Agony |                                                                                                                               |
| :--------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Level                                                                  | 5                                                                                                                             |
| School1                                                                | [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy")                                                                                        |
| Source(s)                                                              | [Book of Necromancy](/Book_of_Necromancy "Book of Necromancy") [Book of the Senses](/Book_of_the_Senses "Book of the Senses") |
| [Casting noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                            | 5                                                                                                                             |
| [Spell noise](/Spell_noise "Spell noise")                              | 0                                                                                                                             |
| Power Cap                                                              | 200                                                                                                                           |
| Range                                                                  | 3                                                                                                                             |
| Hated By                                                               | [Elyvilon](/Elyvilon "Elyvilon") [The Shining One](/The_Shining_One "The Shining One") [Zin](/Zin "Zin")                      |
| Flags                                                                  | Wl check, Dir or target, Needs tracer, Not self                                                                               |

|   |                                                                                                             |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Curses a foe, halving their remaining health after the next two times thatthe caster strikes them in melee. |

**Curse of Agony** is a level 5 [Necromancy](/Necromancy "Necromancy") spell which hexes the victim. If this spell succeeds, the caster's next two melee attacks will [torment](/Torment "Torment") the target, halving their HP for each strike.

[Necromancers](/Necromancer "Necromancer") start with this spell in their libaries.

## Contents

- [1 Useful Info](#Useful_Info)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 Monster Version](#Monster_Version)
- [4 History](#History)

## Useful Info

If Curse of Agony succeeds a [willpower](/Willpower "Willpower") check, it inflicts an Agony enchantment. If the victim is attacked in melee by the caster, it inflicts [torment](/Torment "Torment"), up to 2 torments. This effect happens after weapon damage is applied. Missed attacks don't trigger this effect. This is subject to [negative energy resistance](/Negative_energy_resistance "Negative energy resistance") and torment resistance as usual.

The Agony enchantment lasts for 6-8 turns. Recasting the spell on a monster will increase the duration, however, it will not increase or reset the number of torments available.

Curse of Agony has an [enchantment power](/Enchantment_power "Enchantment power") multiplier of x2.5, which makes it harder to resist than the usual [hex](/Hex "Hex").

## Strategy

Curse of Agony deals considerable damage. It isn't directly lethal, but it can quickly soften up powerful, uninjured targets like [hydras](/Hydra "Hydra") or [giants](/Giant "Giant"). However, the caster must be able to survive a few turns in melee. Don't skimp on the evasion, and prepare a safe line of retreat if things go sour.

If you haven't branched into other magic schools, [Borgnjor's Vile Clutch](/Borgnjor%27s_Vile_Clutch "Borgnjor's Vile Clutch") is a good choice for either an escape tool or a finishing blow.

## Monster Version

Player ghosts with Curse of Agony instead get [Agony](/Agony "Agony"), a spell which inflicts 1 torment directly (if it succeeds a willpower check).

## History

- Curse of Agony was introduced in [0.31](/0.31 "0.31"), replacing the [Agony](/Agony "Agony") player spell.

Curse of Agony

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
 Curse of Agony
Level 5
School1 Necromancy
Source(s) Book of Necromancy
Book of the Senses
Casting noise 5
Spell noise 0
Power Cap 200
Range 3
Hated By Elyvilon
The Shining One
Zin
Flags Wl check, Dir or target, Needs tracer, Not self
Curses a foe, halving their remaining health after the next two times thatthe caster strikes them in melee.

Curse of Agony is a level 5 Necromancy spell which hexes the victim. If this spell succeeds, the caster's next two melee attacks will torment the target, halving their HP for each strike.

Necromancers start with this spell in their libaries.

Contents

  • 1 Useful Info
  • 2 Strategy
  • 3 Monster Version
  • 4 History

Useful Info

If Curse of Agony succeeds a willpower check, it inflicts an Agony enchantment. If the victim is attacked in melee by the caster, it inflicts torment, up to 2 torments. This effect happens after weapon damage is applied. Missed attacks don't trigger this effect. This is subject to negative energy resistance and torment resistance as usual.

The Agony enchantment lasts for 6-8 turns. Recasting the spell on a monster will increase the duration, however, it will not increase or reset the number of torments available.

Curse of Agony has an enchantment power multiplier of x2.5, which makes it harder to resist than the usual hex.

Strategy

Curse of Agony deals considerable damage. It isn't directly lethal, but it can quickly soften up powerful, uninjured targets like hydras or giants. However, the caster must be able to survive a few turns in melee. Don't skimp on the evasion, and prepare a safe line of retreat if things go sour.

If you haven't branched into other magic schools, Borgnjor's Vile Clutch is a good choice for either an escape tool or a finishing blow.

Monster Version

Player ghosts with Curse of Agony instead get Agony, a spell which inflicts 1 torment directly (if it succeeds a willpower check).

History

  • Curse of Agony was introduced in 0.31, replacing the Agony player spell.

{{version031}}
{{spell info}}
'''Curse of Agony''' is a level 5 [[Necromancy]] spell which hexes the victim. If this spell succeeds, the caster's next two melee attacks will [[torment]] the target, halving their HP for each strike.

[[Necromancer]]s start with this spell in their libaries.

==Useful Info==
If Curse of Agony succeeds a [[willpower]] check, it inflicts an Agony enchantment. If the victim is attacked in melee by the caster, it inflicts [[torment]], up to 2 torments. This effect happens after weapon damage is applied. Missed attacks don't trigger this effect. This is subject to [[negative energy resistance]] and torment resistance as usual. 

The Agony enchantment lasts for 6-8 turns. Recasting the spell on a monster will increase the duration, however, it will not increase or reset the number of torments available.

Curse of Agony has an [[enchantment power]] multiplier of x2.5, which makes it harder to resist than the usual [[hex]].

==Strategy==
Curse of Agony deals considerable damage. It isn't directly lethal, but it can quickly soften up powerful, uninjured targets like [[hydra]]s or [[giant]]s. However, the caster must be able to survive a few turns in melee. Don't skimp on the evasion, and prepare a safe line of retreat if things go sour. 

If you haven't branched into other magic schools, [[Borgnjor's Vile Clutch]] is a good choice for either an escape tool or a finishing blow.

==Monster Version==
Player ghosts with Curse of Agony instead get [[Agony]], a spell which inflicts 1 torment directly (if it succeeds a willpower check).

==History==
*Curse of Agony was introduced in [[0.31]], replacing the [[Agony]] player spell.
